item.title: 去年清洁能源工作岗位的增长速度是美国总体工作岗位增长速度的两倍
item.description:
该国在电动汽车和电池制造、可再生能源及相关行业新增就业岗位142,00个，占能源行业新增就业岗位的一半以上。【原文：

The country added 142,00 jobs in EV and battery manufacturing, renewables and related sectors, amounting to more than half of new employment in the energy industry. 

】

item.title: 马来西亚考虑恢复消费税以增加财政收入
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，马来西亚政府正在权衡恢复征收基础广泛的消费税，而不是削减一种常用汽油的补贴，因为政府正在努力加强财政。【原文：Malaysia is weighing the return of a broad-based consumption tax instead of implementing subsidy cuts for a commonly-used gasoline as the government seeks to bolster its finances, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 土耳其计划加强伊斯坦布尔出租车服务以解决乘客投诉问题
item.description: 土耳其计划增加伊斯坦布尔的出租车数量，因为多年来人们一直对在该国商业之都找车难表示不满。【原文：Turkey plans to increase the number of taxis in Istanbul following years of outcry over the difficulty of finding a ride in the country’s commercial capital.】

item.title: 利比亚石油停产，日产量减少 40 万桶
item.description: 本周，利比亚的石油产量几乎减少了一半，因为在谁控制利比亚中央银行的问题上出现了僵局，油田减少了作业。【原文：Libya’s oil output has almost halved this week as fields reduce operations amid a stalemate over who controls the country’s central bank.】

item.title: 期限需求减弱，奥地利放弃出售 2086 年债券的计划
item.description: 周三，奥地利决定不再进行长期债券的银团销售，这是投资者对长期债券兴趣减退的最新迹象。【原文：Austria decided not to proceed with a syndicated sale of long-maturity bonds on Wednesday, the latest sign of fading investor appetite for duration.】

item.title: 澳门候选人警告博彩业 "疯狂 "扩张
item.description: 澳门一名前法官宣布有意竞选澳门最高领导职位，他对赌场在当地经济中发挥的主导作用提出了警告，这番言论可能会增加该行业的忧虑。【原文：A former judge in Macau who announced he intends to run for the city’s top leadership position warned against the dominant role casinos play in the local economy, comments that could add to the worries for the industry.】

item.title: 他信领导的政党酝酿与民主党结盟，泰国的敌对关系正在融化
item.description: 泰国执政党为泰党已邀请一名前竞争对手加入其联盟，新任总理白通丹-西那瓦（Paetongtarn Shinawatra）的目标是在下月初完成组阁。【原文：Thailand’s ruling Pheu Thai Party has invited a former rival to join its coalition, as new Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra aims to finalize her cabinet by early next month.】

item.title: 警方称诺沃火灾是天气、吸烟而非犯罪所致
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）位于丹麦的生产中心发生火灾，警方没有发现与火灾有关的犯罪活动迹象，但表示天气和吸烟等因素可能是导致 5 月份火灾的原因。【原文：Police found no indication of criminal activity linked to a fire at Novo Nordisk A/S’s manufacturing hub in Denmark, saying factors including the weather and smoking may have contributed to the blaze in May.】

item.title: 神秘举动 "引发土耳其里拉在恢复平静前下跌
item.description: 土耳其里拉在早盘交易中突然短暂暴跌，让交易员们抓耳挠腮，急于减少损失，随后该货币走上了一条更可预测的道路。【原文：A brief and sudden plunge in Turkey’s lira during early trading left traders scratching their heads and rushing to cut losses, before the currency settled on a more predictable path.】

item.title: 利润下滑，中国博康计划进行罕见的中期分红
item.description: 中国最大的国有贷款机构之一--交通银行股份有限公司在利润下降的情况下宣布了十多年来的首次中期股息。【原文：Bank of Communications Co., one of China’s largest state-owned lenders, announced its first interim dividend in more than a decade despite a decline in profits.】

item.title: 中国石油天然气股份有限公司因石油钻探业务增长而利润增加
item.description: 中国石油天然气股份有限公司（Cnooc Ltd.）表示，今年上半年的利润有所增长，因为中国最大的海上石油和天然气生产商受益于产量的增长和全球原油价格的上涨。【原文：Cnooc Ltd. said first half profits rose this year, as the country’s largest offshore oil and gas producer benefited from growing output and rise in global crude prices.】

item.title: 奥运平静之后，政治僵局重燃法国股市风险
item.description: 在经历了奥运会期间的相对平静之后，法国股市面临的风险再次上升。【原文：After a period of relative calm during the Olympics, the risks weighing on French stocks are again on the rise.】

item.title: 沙特财富基金再融资 150 亿美元循环信用贷款
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金与当地银行集团签署了一项 150 亿美元的循环信贷融资协议，以取代之前于 2021 年达成的融资协议。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund has signed a $15 billion revolving credit facility with a group of local banks, replacing a previous funding agreement agreed in 2021.】

item.title: 马来西亚星巴克经营者受到反以色列抵制的伤害
item.description: 在马来西亚经营星巴克咖啡连锁店的 Berjaya Food Bhd 公司第四季度出现亏损，原因是消费者对中东冲突的担忧影响了销售。【原文：Berjaya Food Bhd., which operates the Starbucks coffee chain in Malaysia, posted a loss in the fourth quarter as consumer sentiment on the Middle East conflict hurt sales.】

item.description: CVC Capital Partners Plc 已同意入股瑞典房地产管理公司 Odevo AB。【原文：CVC Capital Partners Plc has agreed to take a stake in Swedish property manager Odevo AB.】

item.title: 国航、南航最新从 Comac 购买 C919 飞机
item.description: 中国国家广播电视公司（CCTV）周三称，中国商飞准备向新运营商中国国际航空股份有限公司（Air China Ltd.）和中国南方航空股份有限公司（China Southern Airlines Co.【原文：China’s Comac is poised to hand over the first of two single-aisle C919 jets to new operators Air China Ltd. and China Southern Airlines Co., state broadcaster CCTV said Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国银行的西亚说：日本和中东企业转向东南亚
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）新加坡国家主管马丁-西亚（Martin Siah）表示，中东和日本公司正越来越多地将东南亚视为部署资本的首选目的地，因为它们将部分潜在投资从亚洲其他地区转移到了东南亚。【原文：Middle Eastern and Japanese companies are increasingly seeing Southeast Asia as a destination of choice to deploy capital as they pivot some of the potential investment away from the rest of Asia, according to Bank of America Corp.’s Singapore country head Martin Siah.】

item.title: Anchor 从 Legal & General 借贷 8,500 万英镑建造房屋
item.description: 在政府承诺大幅增加供应量后，护理之家和退休住房公司 Anchor 已向 Legal & General Assurance Society Ltd. 借款 8500 万英镑（1.125 亿美元），用于在英国建造经济适用房。【原文：Care home and retirement housing firm Anchor has borrowed £85 million ($112.5 million) from Legal & General Assurance Society Ltd. to build affordable housing in the UK after the government promised to dramatically boost supply.】

item.title: SAS 聘用诺和诺德前高管担任破产保护后航空公司主席
item.description: 北欧航空公司 SAS AB 完成了为期两年的重组，在美国破产保护程序中脱颖而出，拥有了新的董事长和所有者。【原文：Scandinavian airline SAS AB completed a two-year restructuring, emerging from a US Chapter 11 process with a new chairman and owners.】

item.title: 日本麒麟公司再次延长对凡客诚品的要约收购截止日期
item.description: 麒麟控股公司（Kirin Holdings Co.【原文：Kirin Holdings Co. again extended its tender offer deadline for Fancl Corp., as the Japanese brewer works to secure a deal for the Japanese skincare and health supplement maker.】

The FTSE 100, launched on Jan. 3, 1984, was one of many innovations that transformed the City of London in the 1980s.】

item.title: 瑞典诺巴银行扩大战略审查范围，将首次公开募股纳入其中
item.description: 瑞典诺巴银行集团（NOBA Bank Group AB）表示正在评估首次公开募股的可能性，这证实了彭博新闻社早些时候的报道。【原文：Swedish lender NOBA Bank Group AB says it’s evaluating a possible initial public offering, confirming an earlier report by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 花旗集团预计未来几个季度亚洲交易活动将增多
item.description: 花旗集团亚太区投资银行业务主管 Jan Metzger 表示，随着印度、台湾和日本等市场的蓬勃发展，以及来自中国的大量交易，亚太区的交易活动将在未来几个季度内增长。【原文：Dealmaking activity in Asia Pacific is set to grow over the coming quarters amid a boom in markets including India, Taiwan and Japan, and a strong pipeline of transactions from China, according to Citigroup Inc.’s head of investment banking in Asia Pacific Jan Metzger.】

item.title: 巴伐利亚北欧集团的大幅反弹只是动荡历史中的最新一例
item.description: 本月巴伐利亚北欧公司（Bavarian Nordic A/S）股价上涨近 50%，这对这家丹麦疫苗开发商来说并不稀奇。不过，随之而来的下跌也并不常见。【原文：This month’s near 50% rally in Bavarian Nordic A/S shares is nothing unusual for the Danish vaccine developer. But then again, neither are the falls that have often followed.】

item.title: 保诚新业务利润下降 1.4%，主要受中国大陆和香港市场影响
item.description: 保诚集团（Prudential Plc）报告称，受中国大陆、香港和印度尼西亚销售放缓的影响，上半年新业务利润下降了 1.4%。【原文：Prudential Plc reported a 1.4% drop in new business profit for the first half, hit by slower sales in mainland China, Hong Kong and Indonesia.】

item.title: 莱纳斯公司认为中国稀土需求随着价格上涨而上升
item.description: 莱纳斯稀土有限公司（Lynas Rare Earths Ltd.）表示，中国对其材料的需求正在回升，这些材料被广泛应用于风力涡轮机、军事硬件和电动汽车等领域。【原文：Lynas Rare Earths Ltd. said Chinese demand for its materials — used in everything from wind turbines to military hardware and electric vehicles — is picking up, with prices showing signs of recovery following a two-year slump.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为印度公司每年的美元债券销售额将翻一番
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）的一位高管表示，随着美联储发出降低利率的信号，印度企业发行美元债券的步伐将加快，2024 年剩余时间内可能至少销售 40 亿美元。【原文：Indian firms’ dollar bond offerings are set to gather pace with at least $4 billion of sales likely in the rest of 2024, as the Federal Reserve signals lower interest rates, according to a JPMorgan Chase & Co. executive.】
